pr_title: Fix bug in classpath resolver when there are PDSC-PDL cross references.

timeline.message: Fix bug in classpath resolver when there are PDSC-PDL cross references.

timeline.bodyText: I assume that you purposely choose a different namespace in the test com.linkedin.rest.li.example (vs. com.linkedin.data.schema) to well test class loader from resource.
timeline.author: mchen07
